title: Amber Mosquito
summaries: The Amber Mosquito is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Dinosaur to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, a pterosaur will carry it by the tail to continue following them. The Amber Mosquito can be obtained by putting Silt, Slush, or Desert Fossils(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) into an Extractinator or Chlorophyte Extractinator(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). With Silt or Slush, it only has a 1/10,000 (0.01%) chance to drop, while with Desert Fossils it has a slightly higher chance of 27/100,000 (0.027%).

statistics.Sell: 7 GC50 SC
